byline.original: By JEFF ZELENY and JIM RUTENBERG

abstract: Republican presidential hopeful Rick Perry has switched advisers and altered his strategy as time runs short in nomination contest.
snippet: As time runs short in the nominating contest, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas is using new advisers and a new strategy on how to better introduce a candidate.
lead_paragraph: As time runs short in the nominating contest, Gov. Rick Perry of Texas is using new advisers and a new strategy on how to better introduce a candidate.

headline.main: Perry Presses for Second Look From Early Voters
headline.print_headline: Perry Presses for Second Look From Early Voters
headline.seo: Rick Perry Presses for Second Look From Early Voters
